enWisdom: Seeking honour [for oneself] through arrogance is [a cause of] humiliation
Piety is an exalter
Good action is the superior [form of] piety (or piety is the most preferred action)
God-wariness is the accumulator of [all] purity and chastity

Wisdom: التَّقْوَى ظَاهِرُهُ شَرَفُ الدُّنْيَا وَبَاطِنُهُ شَرَفُ الْآخِرَةِ
enWisdom: The exterior of God-wariness is honour in this world while its interior is honour in the Hereafter

Wisdom: أَشْعِرْ قَلْبَكَ التَّقْوَى وَخَالِفِ الْهَوَى تَغْلِبِ الشَّيْطَانَ
enWisdom: Fill your heart with God-wariness and oppose your vain desires, [by this] you will overcome Satan

Wisdom: ارْغَبُوا فِيمَا وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الْمُتَّقِينَ فَإِنَّ أَصْدَقَ الْوَعْدِ مِيعَادُهُ
enWisdom: Aspire for what Allah has promised the God-wary, for surely the truest promises are His promises

Wisdom: إِنَّ التَّقْوَى عِصْمَةٌ لَكَ فِي حَيَاتِكَ وَزُلْفَى لَكَ بَعْدَ مَمَاتِكَ
enWisdom: Verily God-wariness is a protection for you in your life and a means of gaining nearness [to Allah] after your death

Wisdom: إِنَّ التَّقْوَى فِي الْيَوْمِ الْحِرْزُ وَالْجُنَّةُ وَفِي غَدٍ الطَّرِيقُ إِلَى الْجَنَّةِ مَسْلَكُهَا وَاضِحٌ وَسَالِكُهَا رَابِحٌ
enWisdom: Verily God-wariness is today a safeguard and a shield, and tomorrow [it is] a pathway to Paradise; its path is clear and the one who travels on it, gains

Wisdom: إِنَّ تَقْوَى اللَّهِ عِمَارَةُ الدِّينِ وَعِمَادُ الْيَقِينِ وَإِنَّهَا لَمِفْتَاحُ صَلَاحٍ وَمِصْبَاحُ نَجَاحٍ
enWisdom: Indeed the fear of Allah is the maintainer of faith and the pillar of certitude, and it is surely the key to righteousness and the lamp of success

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ فَارَقَ التَّقْوَى أُغْرِيَ بِاللَّذَّاتِ وَالشَّهَوَاتِ وَوَقَعَ فِي تِيهِ السَّيِّئَاتِ وَلَزِمَهُ كَبِيرُ التَّبِعَاتِ
enWisdom: Verily the one who abandons God-wariness is lured by pleasures and lustful desires, and falls into the wilderness of sins and is constantly plagued by grave (or many) [evil] consequences
Lack of contentment is the bane of piety
The sting (or blackness) of sins is cut off by God-wariness

Wisdom: بِالْوَرَعِ يَكُونُ التَّنَزُّهُ مِنَ الدَّنَايَا [عَنِ الدَّنَايَا]
enWisdom: Through piety there is purification from lowly traits
The fruit of being pious is purity [from sins]
Through God-wariness, actions become pure
It is through piety that a believer is purified

Wisdom: دَاوُوا بِالتَّقْوَى الْأَسْقَامَ وَبَادِرُوا بِهَا الْحِمَامَ وَاعْتَبِرُوا بِمَنْ أَضَاعَهَا وَلَا يَعْتَبِرَنَّ بِكُمْ مَنْ أَطَاعَهَا
enWisdom: Treat your [spiritual] ailments with God-wariness and anticipate [and prepare for] your death by it; take a lesson from those who have neglected it and ensure that those who heed to it do not take a lesson from you [for having neglected it]
Be pious and you will become pure
Be free from sin and you will be pious
One who is on his guard remains safe
One who is God-wary reforms [his Hereafter]
One who lacks piety, his heart is dead
With piety, actions bear fruit

Wisdom: هُدِيَ مَنْ أَشْعَرَ التَّقْوَى قَلْبَهُ [قَلْبَهُ التَّقْوَى‏]
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who fills his heart with God-wariness

Wisdom: وَرَعُ الْمَرْءِ يُنَزِّهُهُ عَنْ كُلِّ دَنِيَّةٍ
enWisdom: The piety of a person frees him from every vileness
Do not dishonour the one who has been elevated by God-wariness
There is no piety with deviation
